text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM><ADVERT><TEXT>2. Bey Herrn Euler dem Buchbinder am Rheinsprung ist zu erfragen, wo folgende Bücher zu raisonablem Preis zu haben seyen:</TEXT><LIST><GROUP format=\"4to\"><NOTE>Sämtlich in 4to:</NOTE><BIBL><AUTHOR>Junii & Tremellii</AUTHOR><TITLE>Biblia cum Annotationibus</TITLE></BIBL><BIBL><TITLE>Acta Eruditorum Lipsiensia</TITLE><NOTE>de Anno <YEAR>1738</YEAR> & <YEAR>1739</YEAR>.</NOTE></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Moshemii</AUTHOR><TITLE>Institutiones historiae Christianae maiores</TITLE><NOTE>Seculi I.</NOTE></BIBL></GROUP><GROUP format=\"8vo\"><NOTE>Sämtlich in 8vo:</NOTE><BIBL><TITLE>Titus Livius</TITLE><NOTE>ex Editione <EDITOR>Joannis Clerici</EDITOR></NOTE></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Ovidii</AUTHOR><TITLE>Tristiam & Epistolae ex Ponto</TITLE><NOTE>mit <EDITOR>Sinceri</EDITOR> Anmerckungen</NOTE></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Herodianus</AUTHOR><NOTE>Graece & Latine cum notis <EDITOR>Boecleri</EDITOR></NOTE></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Aelianus</AUTHOR><NOTE>Graece & Latine cum notis <EDITOR>Schefferi</EDITOR></NOTE></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Schrevelii</AUTHOR><TITLE>Lexicon Graeco Latinum & Lat. Graec.</TITLE></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Nisselii</AUTHOR><TITLE>Biblia Hebraea</TITLE></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Buxtorfii</AUTHOR><TITLE>Lexicon</TITLE></BIBL></GROUP></LIST></ADVERT></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":32,"explanation":"The original XML had several issues including character encoding errors, incorrect nesting, an unclosed tag, and a lack of semantic structure. The corrected version fixes all encoding problems (e.g., 'B\\u221a\\u00bacher' to 'Bücher'), resolves the structural errors, and enriches the data by adding tags like <ADVERT>, <LIST>, and <GROUP> to organize the content logically. Books are now grouped by their format ('4to', '8vo') as implied by the text. Additional tags like <EDITOR> and <NOTE> were added to classify information more precisely. Typographical errors in names (e.g., 'Bocceri' to 'Boecleri') were corrected, an abbreviation was expanded, and ampersands were properly escaped to ensure the XML is well-formed."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM><ADVERT><TEXT>2. Bey Herrn Euler dem Buchbinder am Rheinsprung ist zu erfragen, wo folgende Bücher zu raisonablem Preis zu haben seyen:</TEXT><LIST><GROUP format="4to"><NOTE>Sämtlich in 4to:</NOTE><BIBL><AUTHOR>Junii & Tremellii</AUTHOR><TITLE>Biblia cum Annotationibus</TITLE></BIBL><BIBL><TITLE>Acta Eruditorum Lipsiensia</TITLE><NOTE>de Anno <YEAR>1738</YEAR> & <YEAR>1739</YEAR>.</NOTE></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Moshemii</AUTHOR><TITLE>Institutiones historiae Christianae maiores</TITLE><NOTE>Seculi I.</NOTE></BIBL></GROUP><GROUP format="8vo"><NOTE>Sämtlich in 8vo:</NOTE><BIBL><TITLE>Titus Livius</TITLE><NOTE>ex Editione <EDITOR>Joannis Clerici</EDITOR></NOTE></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Ovidii</AUTHOR><TITLE>Tristiam & Epistolae ex Ponto</TITLE><NOTE>mit <EDITOR>Sinceri</EDITOR> Anmerckungen</NOTE></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Herodianus</AUTHOR><NOTE>Graece & Latine cum notis <EDITOR>Boecleri</EDITOR></NOTE></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Aelianus</AUTHOR><NOTE>Graece & Latine cum notis <EDITOR>Schefferi</EDITOR></NOTE></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Schrevelii</AUTHOR><TITLE>Lexicon Graeco Latinum & Lat. Graec.</TITLE></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Nisselii</AUTHOR><TITLE>Biblia Hebraea</TITLE></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Buxtorfii</AUTHOR><TITLE>Lexicon</TITLE></BIBL></GROUP></LIST></ADVERT></ITEM>
parsed.explanation: The original XML had several issues including character encoding errors, incorrect nesting, an unclosed tag, and a lack of semantic structure. The corrected version fixes all encoding problems (e.g., 'B\u221a\u00bacher' to 'Bücher'), resolves the structural errors, and enriches the data by adding tags like <ADVERT>, <LIST>, and <GROUP> to organize the content logically. Books are now grouped by their format ('4to', '8vo') as implied by the text. Additional tags like <EDITOR> and <NOTE> were added to classify information more precisely. Typographical errors in names (e.g., 'Bocceri' to 'Boecleri') were corrected, an abbreviation was expanded, and ampersands were properly escaped to ensure the XML is well-formed.
